content:
{"name": "SCCM - East Albemarle Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The pantry is through the side door located on the left side of the building. Walk-ins are welcome. No appointment is required to receive food assistance.
If you have questions, please call our office at 704.982.7915

Eligible clients are able to receive Clothing Vouchers every 6 months to help get clothes for the winter and summer months.
There are two steps to get clothing and household items:
1. Make an appointment with our Assistance center to obtain the voucher  704-982-7915
2. Call the Clothing Closet to make an appointment to shop for your items. 704-982-0246", "email": "", "url": "https://www.sccminc.org/food-pantries", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1324 East Main Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Albemarle", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28001", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.3519581, "longitude": -80.1781341}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 982-7915", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
